content.detailedDescription: We decided a random wendover trip so i was driving around 1 or 2am in the middle of he desert. i saw a bright white flashing light on the horizon and my first thought was ufo because that's how i am, but i decided not to say anything. all the sudden i was very close in front of us and my boyfriend sees it and shouts "it's a ufo" it was traveling very fast east while we were going west it was on the right side of us and flew very low too low to be a plane and too fast. it was disc shaped it appeared it was very dark but it's sides were paneled in bright white lights which would flash in order down it's side and start over again. i was terrified and frozen. earlier in the night my boyfriend said to look at the stars through my sun roof and my first thought was ufos so it freaked me out that we saw one later on. i frequently have reoccurring dreams (among other scary things i'd like to get in touch with an investigator about) of ufos flying over me, being terrified and the ufo would fly back over me hover and my dream would end. i was scared it was about to happen in real life but the ufo we saw kept flying east very fast
content.summary: On way to wendover in west desert

content.detailedDescription: While taking photographs by keeping shutter close for around 30 seconds we found the unknown ray of light in the sky which was not to be seen by naked eyes, but can see in the photograph.
content.summary: Cone shape glittering

content.detailedDescription:
9/20/14 7:45 pm.
 
husband and i were driving on highway 99e, going northbound coming out of woodburn, or, heading into hubbard, or.
 
it appeared suddenly, in the sky ahead of us, brightly lit, outlined like a silvery neon blue triangle, with a clearly angled shape. the long sides of the triangle were bright (almost like the internal light of a firefly - like it was lit from the inside), but the back end was not as lit up. (the top and bottom edge was clearly noticeable. the back edge was there, but less visible- not as bright.) it was like the edges were lit-up tubes - we could see sky through the middle of the object. it was not an opaque shape.
  
it appeared as if coming out from behind cloud cover- but there were no clouds.   it hovered for maybe 3/10ths of a second - long enough to register it was there, and then it moved left to right in a slight descent, but flew so fast we could barely watch it, and then it was gone.  there were trees to the right about 100 yards away - but it disappeared before it even got to the trees - like it went back into the clouds, only there weren't any.
 
there was no tail - it wasn't a comet, and there was no smoke or trail or lights- it wasn't a plane.  at least not one of which we could say, "oh yes, that was definitely a plane, or, it was just a model plane or a kite." there was no sound.  it did not come close to the ground, there was no landing.  

there were no people around, but it was still light enough that we could have easily seen if there were people flying a kit or model planes.

if we had blinked, we would have missed it, it was that fast. 
 
i've never seen anything like it before.

we discussed it the rest of the way home:  i saw a triangular shape, like an isosceles triangle on its side. my husband saw a bow-tie like shape, like two isosceles triangles on their sides, point-to-point. we have been trying to come up with answers of what it could be, but each time, we are left with unanswered questions.
content.summary: Between woodburn and hubbard oregon, brightly lit, silvery neon blue triangle, with a clearly angled shape, appeared, traveled in descent, but did not land.

content.detailedDescription:
We were northbound out of mesa on us 87. not sure exactly where, but the photo shows a road sign that i can't quite read, but it was somewhere south of four peaks.
i did not observe this object but only noticed it when looking at the picture later. the photo was taken through the windshield of the vehicle. i hesitated filing a report as i assumed there was probably just something on the glass. hopefully someone can determine if the picture is consistent with these circumstances. i took several other photos through the windshield that day and i think i would have captured it again if whatever it was had remained there.
content.summary: Darker in the center, getting lighter outwords

content.detailedDescription:
1.Balcony taking night shots in raw wanting to learn more about raw file.
2.Playing with light and color in photoshop 
3.Military plane, shadow, and than on the tree i thought i saw owls because of the 2 little lights were shining on the right and far left of the photo.
4. only the shadow of the triangular military plane (to me at least it seems like)
5. i thought what weirdos 
6. went to bed
content.summary: Decided to take night photography only played with the image and saw odd things

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down lindsay southbound towards gilbert (city) area at around 7:30pm when me and my friend noticed 3 lights hovering south west of our direction we were at an intersection at lindsay and baseline, several cars saw the lights.  at first the 3 flying orbs just hovered for a bit but after 2-3 min it began to slowly rotate and shows a fourth light.   i knew this was no plane or helicopter because the lights hovered still and when they moved they were in sync with each other. the object was shaped in a pyramid shape with the bottom part towards the sky and the point towards the ground. at first the 3 lights looked like a triangle but after it rotated it looked more like a pyramid. it then began to move after it rotated and i proceeded to follow it going south on lindsay, the hovering lights where traveling south west but i tried keeping up with it until a mile or so each light began to fade away individually until all 4 lights were gone at around lindsay and guadalupe rd. my friend and i were completely surprised by what just happened, we wanted to see where the lights would go but they all began to fade away and we lost sight of the lights at that point. 

i don't have a video of the event but as i was looking through your websites "reported sightings" page i saw a report in chandler, az with video footage of exactly what i saw
content.summary: 3-4 flying orbs in sky. 3 lights where in a pyramid shape that rotated and showed a 4th

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in railyard in catawba sc at about 215am, when out of corner of my eye i saw a huge fireball big as a full moon descending down over papermill,  over catawba river.
it was almost like it was walking down stairs.  at first i thought space debris or flare, but not shooting star, not airplane, not helicopter or satellite it was huge..  i asked my coworker if he could see object and he could not.  i said no worries this should be on the news in the morning..  then it fell behind papermill out of sight.
content.summary: Looked like huge fireball descending and changing direction out of sky over catawba river,  may have been something burning up in atmosphere but not in straight line

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were driving on the highway when we suddenly saw a big ball of light which at first we thought was a light post but then realized it was too high to be a light post and there were no other lights in the area. as we got closer to this strange light it started moving in a upward diagonal direction, was moving very fast and had blue and red lights trailing behind it. it kept moving in that direction until it disappeared into the darkness.
content.summary: Stationary ball of light that suddenly starting moving across the sky, emitting blue and red light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv in the living room. we have a view of puget sound. from my chair i saw several balls of reddish light in the sky. i went out on the deck to get a better look. i got scared and yelled for my husband to come outside.
we observed them for at least 10 to 15 minutes. we both couldn't believe what we were seeing. my husband is quite the skeptic, but even he was scared. we kept asking each other "what are they?" 
sorry i have no video, but we were scared. i am 61 and he is 76, and have never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 9 circular balls of red/orange glowing light

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work down howell branch road toward aloma, saw very bright yellowish light in the sky.  initially it looked like a spot light from a helicopter nearby, but was not the right color.  light continued to get brighter and it appeared to have a tail behind it.  myself, and the car in front of me pulled over and exited our vehicles to watch it.  while watching it, it appeared to be a huge meteor with a white flame tail behind it. it was massive and the trail behind it was huge, and even though myself and the car in front of me saw it, other people had to have seen it.

the tail immediatly behind it started emitting blue and orange flame and appeared to be slowing, then started to fade in the sky like a meteor burning out, and the trail behind it continued to fade and soon vanished, however the object itself of in the distance too far to tell what it was other than a red orange glowing object, changed direction and moved off until it looked like a star.

the light from it was not flashing it almost looked like it was just hot glowing almost like an orange molten rock color.  the object continued off into the distance but was visible even as i had gotten back in my car and continued driving
content.summary: Light though it was a massive meteor but slowed and changed direction

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on gilbert road. saw in sky fireball heading east then quick direction change. about 90 minutes later in same direction saw smaller but similar fireball while walking the dog.
content.summary: Large fireball closer to pryimid shape with long tail and direction change

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:30pm i'm outside looking at the sky when i see a light kinda like going on and off slowly changing directions, after that 4 more lights came out of nowhere and where going down and up and circles
content.summary: Around 5 flying objects

content.detailedDescription:
Well it was 9/9/14 on southwest flight from midway airport to lax during the flight over the desert i saw these huge lights on the ground in the mountains several odd shapes took photos they stayed their for a while.  no other surroundings.  i took these photos from the plane on samsung galaxy 5 today 9/20/14 i went through them the first time and zoomed in they appeared different in each photo and when i zoomed one was surrounded by light but the center was a dark disk ( you have to see these photos on the camera they will blow you away i showed everyone today at work the first thing they said ufo that's hard core proof i'm shaking i have had numerous encounters before but could never photograph till these)  i lived in saint cloud fl in 2010 one hovered over my house early in the morning people chased it with a baseball bat.  when i was flying back on 12/31/13 on southwest from chicago to lax there was a news story of ufo sighting that night.  these photos are wow prof positive.  several months ago i was sleeping in my room and something was standing at my feet i was paralyzed and tried to scream but could not move.  it might have been a dream but i thought it was like a alligator standing at the foot of my bed watching me sleep freaky. 

i have other pics but you have to see on the camera phone more detail

i don't know exactly where the x and location i was in the plane.  but i left chicago around 2:20 and got home around 4:00 

i never saw them fly but different photos show different structures and sizes but in different places as if they moved
content.summary: I was on a plane they were sitting on the ground in the mountains of desert

content.detailedDescription: I was headed south on hwy 87 from i-10 on september 19, 2014 around approximately 8:30pm. i was a little north of buck pond but i'm pretty sure we had already went through the red light that merged into the single lane road. i glanced in my drivers side rear view mirror because a car behind me had bright lights on. when i glanced out a bright light above the treeline caught my eye. when i looked up, about maybe a football field away, i saw two collections of lights that were separated by about 20ft, i couldn't see one completely because of the trees but from i what i saw, it mirrored the one closest to me, which had three bigger bright lights in the shape of a triangle with several smaller lights beneath/north of it. it looked something like this <   >. i looked back and forth between it and the road about 4-5 times and then it was gone the next time i looked up. at first i thought it was fireworks but it didn't move at all and there was no noise. the absence of noise made me realize that my pandora stopped working on my phone. i wasn't able to get the 4g connection on my phone for about another mile or so.
content.summary: There were two collections of lights that were seperated by about 20ft, i couldn't see one completely but from i what i saw it mirrored the one closest to me, which was traingular shaped with several smaller lights beneath it.

content.detailedDescription: Out on deck with wife and friend ,looked up to see gold light just floating towards us.No noise a plane flew past it.As it got closer no change to light at all very bright .A red light flashed in rear not as normal aircraft and a white light flashed in front.It appeared as if it were 3 lights but a cylinder shadow background i guess you can call it .The forward and aft light did not behave as typical aircraft.It traveled straight but slow ,never saw anything like it before.
content.summary: Bright light as if it were gold

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for my wife to finish her insurance sales appointment at a house in newark california, i witnessed an odd looking black oval shaped object that appeared to be pulsating or constantly changing shape ascending into the sky. what raised my curiosity was how it was moving - in an ascending path but floating quickly. i ruled out a balloon because it moved steady and in a straight unwavering path about 45 degrees. i watched as how the black color would change back and forth to white and then back to black for about 10 mins then remained a bright white - as if it were reflecting the sunlight.It continued to climb until it looked like a star in the 3:30 ish sky - then it completely stopped. i watched it for 20 more minutes until my wife came out of the customers house. i then showed her the "star" and told her it was a ufo and ive been watching it for a long time and its definitely a ufo. she said she couldn't see it from the sidewalk we were standing but after i pointed where to look, she did see it - looked like a star. she said she had to go to her next appointment and i asked if we could stay so i could continue tracking the ufo. while she was telling me no, 2 smaller fast moving white orbs flew past the "star" then slowly disappeared. we had to leave and i hoped many others saw what i did.
content.summary: Black oval slowly ascended and then stopped in air for 25 mins - looked like a star in the sky. 2 smaller drones appeared at lower altitudes and then disappeared in newark ca on 9/20/14 at around 3:30 pm.

content.detailedDescription: I live in grand haven, michigan township and i'm about 1/8th of a mile from lake michigan.  it was the early morning hours of wednesday, august 27, 2014 at approximately 1:30 am and i was sitting in my car smoking a cigarette and observing the clear night sky.  i usually come outside 4 or 5 times a night to have my cigarette and look into space usually seeing one or more meteorites streaking across the night sky and keep a set of binoculars and my slr-digital camera on hand in case i see anything interesting.  well, this night was different than all the rest because as i viewed the space landscape i noticed an unusual craft about a mile or more away moving in a south-south westerly direction over the lake hills heading out over lake michigan.R  what made this craft stand out from all of the rest i've ever seen in the night sky was this craft had 3-round amber lights that formed a triangle shape with a small round red light in the center pulsing on and off.  i estimate this craft to be rather large because when i see other aircraft (passenger jets, civilian aircraft, and military jets) at that approximate distance away they would be much much smaller than the one i was looking at.  i didn't hear any sound nor see any com-trail, smoke, or any kind of exhaust coming from the craft.  i watched this craft through my binoculars until the craft was out of sight.
content.summary: Observed a slow moving craft with 3-amber colored lights forming a triangle and a small red light in the center pulsing.

content.detailedDescription: What i saw may be related to an event from childhood when a  very similar being resembling the  2 seen on this event was in my bedroom and before walking through my bedroom wall in basement looked at me and put his fingers to his lips as if asking me to be quit. the 2 similar being i saw on sept. 19th again looked right at me then walked directly into the large rock/ boulder. then immediately a blue beam that looked to be maybe 5 feet in diameter rose maybe 30 to 40 feet about the tree tops to the center of this craft , the light vanished in seconds then the craft lifted off at a high rate of speed. look out back window of house, 2 being walk towards a large stone, walk into stone, beam of light shoots from top of stone to craft, craft flies of rapidly
content.summary: Look out back window of house, 2 being walk towards a large stone, walk into stone, beam of light shoots from top of stone to craft, craft flies of rapidly

content.detailedDescription: At airshow in chisinau, moldova we witnessed a strange object on a photo, it was hovering more closer then the low altitude plane in the picture.
content.summary: At airshow in chisinau, moldova we witnessed a strange object on a photo

content.detailedDescription:
1. in front of my residence, smoking a cigarette.

2. turned my head and attention to my left, changing my point of focus from the front of my residence to the rear. looked up and saw object stationary in the clear night sky.

3. i thought that the object was a star, but it appeared closer than the other stars.

4. object was stationary for approximately 10 to 15 seconds and then took off at great speed in a bow like path behind my house and a neighboring tree. object was not quite white and not quite yellow, kind of both colors at the same time.

5.Surprised, ran up the walkway beside my house to attempt to track the object, but i could no longer see the object or where it went. then i just felt weird.

6. the object disappeared behind the top of my house and a neighboring tree.
content.summary: Star-like object - stationary, then left at great speed

content.detailedDescription: We were driving northwards towards jackpot, nv. you could see the city off in the distance. then my husband points out to me this object in the sky. he jokingly said look a ufo. when i looked i noted that it was metallic like an airplane and told him that it was nothing more than just that. (he jokes like that regularly because he likes to get my goat so i thought nothing of the object) i kept looking at it because i could not make out the wing of a plane. i observed the object for a good 5 minutes because i enjoy watching plane fly (also i was trying to make out the defined shape which was oblong and reflective like a plane but without wings). it was stationary and had been from the moment it was first spotted. then it was gone. i blinked to clear my eyes but it didn't matter. the object had just vanished before our eyes. i turned to my husband and asked where it had gone. he also reported the it had vanished before his eyes. he then turned to me and stated that he was right. i never believed in ufo and aliens because i don't like to think those kinds of scary things are real. but i can't deny what i saw. it was there and then it was gone.
content.summary: It was spotted, thought was a plane but then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Llegue a casa después de almorzar, y subí a la terraza para tomar el sol. el cielo estaba despejado, no había nubes, y se podía ver al volcán galeras muy bello, muy iluminado por el sol. pero había una forma extraña en las faldas del galeras que me llamó la atención. yo veo todos los días a mi volcán y lo conozco muy bién y lo que tenía en frente no era normal. una pequeña luz estaba de frente al volcán con un destello leve pero constante, no se movía, pero lo seguí mirandolo, entonces, su tamaño comenzo a crecer, y con esto el nivel de luminosidad. la luz se hizo muy fuerte, y se podía divisar cómo el ovni giraba sobre sí mismo. esto duró aprox. 15 minutos. luego, regreso a su tamaño original y poco a poco se intridujo en el volcán de manera horizontal, penetrando la parte frontal del volcan desapareciendo de mi vista. 
esperé y esperé a que salga y nada.... entonces entré a internet para informarme si alguien en facebook lo había visto, pero no encontré nada... 
pasaron casi 20 minutos, cuando mi compañera de vivienda, subió a verme y le conté que había visto un ovni, y ella se rió, no me creía. le conté todo sin convencerla, pero en ese momento, el ovni volvió a salir y esta vez mi amiga lo vió. se asustó mucho por que el objeto volvió a realizar exactamente el mismo movimiento que yo ví, incluso  se acercó mucho más hacia nosotras que la primera vez que lo ví. ella vio clara su forma y como giraba. luego el ovni entré de nuevo en el volcán y no volvió a salir más. eran como las 14:40 cuando no lo vimos más. luego, salí a trabajar y no volví a ver nada. en estos días he estado muy pendiente de lo que pasa en mi volcán galeras... por estas fechas suele alterarse la actividad volcanica en la zona y me gustaría ver otra vez este suceso para poder grabarlo. lastimosamente el celular no graba de tan lejos. yo vivo en pasto-nariño-colombia. masomenos a 6-7 km en línea recta del volcán. es muy facil verlo, pero siento que tiene visitas muy seguidas de estas naves u ovnis. gracias por leer mi informe.
content.summary: El ovni entró, salió y entró luminosamente del volcán galeras. cambiaba su tamaño y luminisencia. no volvió a salir. dos personas lo vimos.

content.detailedDescription:
Everyone think's crazy or drugs when you report this kind of stuff,  but you tell me.... on 9-15-2014 i stepped outside my studio in arlington texas to take some cloud pics to try out a new app on my phone....  i decided to start with the regular camera for a control experiment to see the difference in quality....  i saw a small square forming very far away and very high altitude in the clouds so i decided to snap a bunch of quick shots for speed and focus....  well after reviewing i noticed a couple little spots i thought was dust or a something on the camera as well as my friends,  until i zoomed....  what i saw puzzled me...  i've never put much thought into it,    so,  if these are something feel free to contact me with your thought's....  thank you for your time....

p.S.  i am a little crazy,  i'm a musician,  but come on,  explain this....  these were in a matter of split seconds and on only 1 frame...  after they were gone,  the square in the clouds dissipated...  wth?
content.summary: Took quick random snap shots with a droid phone to test camera at clouds

content.detailedDescription: First found set of human like footprints exiting the ocean on an uninhabitted beach. this particular beach is not excess able from the ocean due to shallow reef. to access the beach one must make an about 10 min hike through the rainforest. the foot prints came up about 10 feet from surf and made a uturn and went directly back into the ocean. prints were human like as if in moon boots. no treadmarks. large prints, set my size 12 sandal in print same size and shape. 10 min later i walk a few feet down the beach to find another set of prints. these were not human or human like. this set was exactly the same. from the surf came up about ten feet from surf u turn and right back into the ocean.  very strong energy from the moment we stepped on to the beach. footprints were as fresh as the ones we made moments before. took video and a few pictures with my phone although they did not come out well at all.
content.summary: Unexplainable footprint exiting and reentering ocean. extremely fresh prints.

content.detailedDescription:
Long story short, if you could respond i will type more. these events affected me deeply for months after and i wrote over 10 pages describing the events. at around 1am to 3am on july 13 2013 there were events naturally caused by planets and the moon where jupiter, alder baron and the moon alleged and they were around there brightest on the 13th and 14th of july, observable from colorado. nasa confirms this, so at the time i was up observing the serenity of it all. on july 14 at 2:00am and 2:30am there were two flashes that filled the sky and made it almost as bright as daylight for several seconds. my watch started running backwards, my cell phone was working and sending text to the same number i text earlier on its own. very spooky. i was very close to the event although a hill obstructed my view slightly. i went to top of hill and about 10ft diameter crushed vegetation, i saw no orbs or anything else that night, just the explosions.
 on july 13 from 1am to 3am i observed 3 lights converging and then slowly moving away from each other, in an obtuse triangle pattern. i have never seen anything like this. my mood and others around were greatly affected. on july 15 i noticed black metal barrels at several locations around town while driving with friends. as we looked at the shipping address they were all the same, a kaiser permanence near 56th and ward. that's the only thing i could google in that area. these barrels were located near the first days events, at a shopping center near alameda and broadway and a neighborhood near old town littleton. maybe it was just a coincidence but i think they could have been soil samples for whatever purpose. each time there was 4 to 6 barrels. i was followed by a red light as i walked for several miles away from areas that i could see on the night of july 15, 2013. i figure this could have been an unmanned drone or something but i had all these visions for hours as i walked and unlimited energy. all very strange. i can go into the visions later but some showed aliens using sound to propel there crafts, like singing. some explained why certain races disappeared. ect. all very foreign stuff to me and one day i could share in detail. also during this time there were strange folks coming up to me and saying strange things, looking abnormal, one man was like 6ft8, skinny and pale white. he told me many things like where they were from and that i was being watched. no one ever says that stuff! i am not crazy and the story goes on, i just don't have time today. thank you and please respond if possible
content.summary: 3 bright lights convergeing then moveing away at slow to super speeds. seperate event:  2 explosions of light

content.detailedDescription:
i was out with my wife walking the dog at the beach. i took a few shots of the sunset and when i got home i noticed the orb in the pictures. i did not personally see it. when i looked thru the pictures later that night i noticed the orb or whatever it was, i didn't really think about it all that much until i saw some shots my wife took with her iphone that day and she had it on one of hers too. but in a different position in the sky.
one of these pictures are from my wife's camera 100 yards down the beach and on the opposite side of the sun. just want to know what you think .
thanks 
alton
content.summary: Appeared on pictures taken of sunset at surfers point

content.detailedDescription:
Hovering craft flashing lights. glowing red orange outlining in ufo shape
craft covered at least half an hour with zig zag lines in different colors. after about 30 to 40 minutes it drifted far off.
content.summary: Hovering craft flashing lights. glowing red orange outlining in ufo shape

content.detailedDescription: I went out into the garden between 9 and 10 pm. i looked up to see if the stars were visible or if it was going to be a cloudy night. i immediately saw a bright light. there is a small craft airport a few miles north of me. there are always planes in the sky. when they are coming straight at you they look very bright until they get a little closer and you aren't just seeing the front light anymore, you can see the blinking colored lights on the side. i thought that was what i was seeing but it was almost directly above me and that was strange. it didn't move. it grew brighter for a couple of seconds then faded out or ascended within a few more seconds until it completely disappeared. i stayed out for another 10 minutes and saw nothing else out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Very bright light ascended straight up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was out alone after a night in the city, smoking a cigarette and listening to a podcast outside the cinema. there is a childrens playing area there and i sit in the climbing net like a hammock. it was a misty night and usually i would sit there and look at the moon.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg] 

from the right of my vision, three red lights appeared and as i locked onto it (and in spite of the slight fog) i quickly noticed it was a solid craft (during the 4 second sighting). it did not fly in a straight line but sort of swung down and then away, also going faster as it swung away off out of sight. the moment i noticed it and looked at it i was struck instantly by the ease and smoothness with which it passed through the sky. it could not have been that far away because the lights were well spaced and it had body between the lights. it seemed to move so deliberately through the air and took the slight corner like it was not effected by air. hard to describe the non-conventional feeling of seeing this thing move: it was like the framerate in my eyes was turned up - like the atmosphere around it was accomodating for its effortless glide accross the sky (i.E. it made a normal plane look like something that has to drag through the air with a lot of effort). the majestic way that it just glided at a high velocity through the air (it was this speed that caught my attention) then into a curve with which it sped up and went off into the distance was strikingly unusual. the fact that it turned slightly when going higher and faster emphasized the shape of the craft, as the wingtip lights became closer and the 'nose-light' remained in front. the red lights were not crystal clear, but their movement together made them stand out and catch my eye.

jaw open, i removed my headphones (only one ear works on these headphones) and could hear the dull throb of a jet engine (typical of commercial aviation) for about twenty seconds after the sighting, as i walked out into the carpark to try and spot it again. 

throughout the experience, the noise was coming from another direction than where i had spotted the craft (echo? stealth?), and the noise remained dull and never changed until it faded. no special manouvre sounds or changes. i could not see any other planes in the sky at all. please note, the level of disconnect from the noise and the way the craft moved may have led another witness to suggest they were unrelated.

it happened so fast and with such stealth that even if someone had been right next to me it would have been difficult to get the person to look quickly enough. it certainly had me staring in the sky for the next 30 minutes with no luck.

with my rational head on, i would say this craft (although amazing and unknown to civilian observers) is not outside the realms of human capability. but this thought also made me shudder: "there are humans sat in that thing??".
content.summary: Chevron/boomerang dark craft with red light at each wingtip and one at the front

content.detailedDescription: About 630 7 pm while at the los banos flea market my 6 yr old asked what was in the sky? as i looked up i noticed 8 shiny star like objects in the sky spread apart i thought it was odd so i snapped a picture. about 45 minutes later i looked up again and noticed that now the 8 objects divided into 2 groups 4 were nw of los banos still n4 were now sw of los banos and now they were a reddish orange color. when i seen them it was still daylight outside and there were no stars in the sky..I believe it was something else.They looked perfectly round n bright.
content.summary: About 7pm while at the lb flea market my 6 yr old looked up n asked wat was in the sky.A
